Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add logical application workflow and API endpoints

Implemented a complete workflow for adding logical applications to projects, following the same pattern as the Project Add workflow.

Backend Changes:
- Created LogicalApplication domain model with properties: Id, TenantId, Name, ProjectId, Description, OwnerId, Created/Updated metadata
- Added LogicalApplicationValidator with FluentValidation rules
- Implemented LogicalApplicationsStore and ILogicalApplicationsStore
- Created LogicalApplicationsRepository for Firebase/Firestore persistence
- Added LogicalApplicationsController at /api/project/{key}/logical with POST, GET, and GET by ID endpoints
- Created request/response models with validation
- Added query builders: GetAllLogicalApplicationsQuery and GetLogicalApplicationsByProjectQuery
- Registered all services in dependency injection containers

Frontend Changes:
- Created LogicalApplicationsApiClient service for API communication
- Implemented 3-step workflow: Details â†’ Review â†’ Success
- Added form components with validation using Yup
- Created step components: step1 \(form inputs\), step2 \(review\), step3 \(success\)
- Added route at /projects/:projectId/logical/add
- Created ProjectLogical component with "Add Logical" button in the logical tab
- Integrated workflow into project details page
